sub_title: Senior Investment Manager at PGGM Investments
summary:
I help institutional clients in constructing, maintaining and advising on interest- and inflation rate solutions. Our current clients at PGGM consist of Dutch industrywide and corporate pensionfunds with assets under management over €200 billion.

My expertise and passion are with delivering fixed-income portfolio solutions for institutional investors, both in AIFMD funds format or seggregated accounts. My current focus is on (inflation-linked) bonds and interest- and inflation rate derivatives.

In recent years I have actively been building the green bond market. Both through active investing and through engaging in the debate and standard setting in this fast expanding and exciting subset of the fixed income world!
